title: Invitation template title
content:
Here's the sample  
 [Wedding invitation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134119/http:/apracticalwedding.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/VintageDestination-780x780.jpg)

I do like the font used for "ALANNA SANDBURG", but cannot figure out its name, please help.

Font: 

 Market Deco 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134119/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: expadawan

comments.content: **[Market Deco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134119/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-5%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Market%20Deco%20-%20Regular&fid=32a2e56c2aa6fd466a2e098188267b8d&fsize=60&text=ALANNA%20SANDBURG%20DARIUS%20CASTERLEY&wrap=2)** by Steve Ferrera [2006, Free for personal use]
That must be it, many thanks from Finland
You are welcome Markku. Greetings from Greece :)
